languages.text: {n}Вы читаете проникновенную речь о единстве и сострадании, всматриваясь в прихожан. Уставшие, ожесточенные, скорбящие — многие ищут в вере спасения, и с каждым вашим словом их лица светлеют. Возможно, в темный час они вспомнят эту проповедь и сделают выбор в пользу жизни и надежды.{/n}

{n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы читаете проникновенную речь о единстве и сострадании, всматриваясь в прихожан. languages.text: {n}Du hältst eine ergreifende Rede über Einheit und Barmherzigkeit, während du die Gesichter der Gemeindemitglieder studierst. Sie sind müde, gefühllos und traurig ... viele der Anwesenden suchen Erlösung im Glauben und mit jedem deiner Worte hellen sich ihre Mienen auf. Vielleicht erinnern sie sich in einer schwierigen Stunde an deine Predigt und entscheiden sich für das Leben und die Hoffnung, anstelle von Leid und Verzweiflung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. languages.text: {n}Vous prononcez un discours poignant sur l'unité et la compassion tout en étudiant les visages des paroissiens. Fatigués, insensibles, abattus... Beaucoup cherchent le salut dans la foi, et à chaque mot que vous prononcez, vous voyez leurs expressions s'illuminer. Peut-être se souviendront-ils de votre sermon dans l'adversité, et peut-être alors choisiront-ils la vie et l'espoir, plutôt que l'angoisse et la désolation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pronuncias un discurso conmovedor sobre la unidad y la compasión mientras escudriñas los rostros de los parroquianos. Están cansados, hastiados y pesarosos; muchos buscan la salvación en la fe, y con cada palabra que pronuncias, sus expresiones se iluminan cada vez más. Aún es posible que recuerden tu sermón en momentos de adversidad y escojan la vida y la esperanza antes que la angustia y la desesperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}

Aún es posible que recuerden tu sermón en momentos de adversidad y escojan la vida y la esperanza antes que la angustia y la desesperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは今日区民の顔を見ながら、団結と思いやりについての心に染み入るスピーチをする。疲れた顔、不愛想な顔、悲しげな顔…多くの者が信仰による救いを求めている。あなたが言葉を口にするたびに、その表情は明るさを増していく。彼らは逆境に際してあなたの説教を思い出し、苦悩や絶望ではなく生や希望を選ぶかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは今日区民の顔を見ながら、団結と思いやりについての心に染み入るスピーチをする。疲れた顔、不愛想な顔、悲しげな顔…多くの者が信仰による救いを求めている。あなたが言葉を口にするたびに、その表情は明るさを増していく。彼らは逆境に際してあなたの説教を思い出し、苦悩や絶望ではなく生や希望を選ぶかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你进行了一场关于团结与同情的动人演讲。你仔细观察着听众的面孔，他们有的疲惫，有的冷漠，有的哀伤，许多人都渴望能在信仰中找到救赎，而你每说一个字，人们脸上的表情就会变得明亮一分。或许当他们身处逆境的时候，他们会想起你的布道，不再沉沦于痛苦与绝望之中，而是会踏上生命与希望的道路。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你进行了一场关于团结与同情的动人演讲。你仔细观察着听众的面孔，他们有的疲惫，有的冷漠，有的哀伤，许多人都渴望能在信仰中找到救赎，而你每说一个字，人们脸上的表情就会变得明亮一分。或许当他们身处逆境的时候，他们会想起你的布道，不再沉沦于痛苦与绝望之中，而是会踏上生命与希望的道路。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cemaatin gözlerinin içine bakarak birliktelik ve şefkat hakkında dokunaklı bir söylev veriyorsun. İnsanların yüzünden yorgunluk, hissizlik ve hüzün okunuyordu; birçokları inancında kurtuluş arıyordu ve söylediğin her sözle birlikte yüz ifadeleri aydınlanmaya başlıyor. Zorlu anlarda vaazını hatırlayabilirler ve kedere ve umutsuzluğa dalmak yerine yaşama ve umuda tutunabilirler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You give a poignant speech on unity and compassion, studying the faces of parishioners. Tired, callous, sorrowful — many seek salvation in faith, and with every word you speak, their expressions grow brighter. They may yet remember your sermon in an hour of adversity and choose life and hope over anguish and despair.{/n}
